amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds for prosecution for incidental avian death under the Migratory Bird Treaty Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to prosecute or hold liable any person or corporation for a violation of section 2(a) of the Migratory Bird Treaty Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Duncan (SC) amendment (A079) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Duncan (SC) amendment (A079) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A079) offered by Mr. Duncan (SC).
